meanings.definition: A check issued as payment for work done.
meanings.sent1: I received my paycheque on Friday for all the hours I worked.
meanings.sent2: She always deposits her paycheque into her bank account right away.
meanings.sent3: The paycheque was like a little reward for all my hard work.
meanings.sent4: Her paycheque was a symbol of appreciation from her employer.
meanings.sent5: The crisp paper of the paycheque felt like a tangible result of my efforts.

meanings.definition: The total amount of money received in a pay period.
meanings.sent1: My paycheques have been increasing steadily over the past few months.
meanings.sent2: He calculated his monthly budget based on his expected paycheque.
meanings.sent3: The size of the paycheque was a pleasant surprise this time.
meanings.sent4: Her paycheque was a welcome sight after a month of hard work.
meanings.sent5: The number on the paycheque represented all the hours I put in at work.
